tool_description: An api to show all the latest climate change news
name: ClimateChangeLive
title: ClimateChangeLive

api_list.name: Get all Climate Change News
api_list.description: This endpoint returns all news about climate change
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climatechangelive2.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climatechangelive2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

print(response.json())
